description: 2 guys, a tall blond hair guy, a small black hair guy, walking in New York City
text:
Peter: I love exploring the city with you, Steven.
Steven: Me too, Peter. It's always an adventure.

description: 2 guys, looking up in shock, buildings in the background
text:
Steven: What is that in the sky?
Peter: It looks like...aliens!

description: 2 guys, running in panic, people fleeing in the background
text:
Steven: We need to get out of here, Peter!
Peter: I'm right behind you, Steven!

description: 2 guys, hiding behind a car, aliens attacking buildings in the background
text:
Steven: Do you think we're safe here?
Peter: I hope so, Steven. We need to stay low.

description: 2 guys, army soldiers rushing in, helicopters flying overhead
text:
Peter: Look, the army is here!
Steven: Thank goodness, we might be saved!

description: 2 guys, relieved expressions, army soldiers helping civilians in the background
text:
Steven: I'm glad we made it out alive.
Peter: Me too, Steven. Let's thank the soldiers for their bravery.
